T02D1541:180a-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs //
T02D1541:180a-4: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1541:180a-5: 'dir bsgom pa la dbang bar gyur bas /
T02D1541:180a-6: ri bo la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa'i gnas
T02D1541:180a-7: su bde ba'i sten la 'jug nas sems can gyi
T02D1541:180a-8: don la mngon par brtson pa'i blos /
T02D1541:180a-9: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i bam
T02D1541:180a-10: yig li khri'i mdog ltar dmar ba'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1541:180a-11: // bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1541:180a-12: dpa' dang bcas pa'i rdo rje phag mo gsal bar
T02D1541:180a-13: bltas la yid las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D1541:180a-15: sdig pa bshad pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1541:180a-16: de nas byams dang snying rje dang /
T02D1541:180a-17: dga' dang btang snyoms las 'das pas //
T02D1541:180a-18: chos kun gdod nas gnas pas na //
T02D1541:180a-19: ngo bo nyid med des rtogs bya //
T02D1541:180a-20: stong pa'i nam mkha' pam byung ba'i //
T02D1541:180a-21: chu skyes dmar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1541:180a-22: dbyangs dang gsal byed las byung ba'i //
T02D1541:180a-23: zla ba nyi ma'i rnam par bsgoms //
T02D1541:180a-24: de dbus bam las dza ba ltar //
T02D1541:180b-0: dmar @180b pa'i rdo rje'i me dbus su //
T02D1541:180b-1: slar yang bam yig de 'od spros //
T02D1541:180b-2: bsdus las rang lha'i gzugs su rdzogs //
T02D1541:180b-3: padma r'a ga'i mdog mtshungs pa //
T02D1541:180b-4: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste //
T02D1541:180b-5: spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba mo //
T02D1541:180b-6: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan cing //
T02D1541:180b-7: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1541:180b-8: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1541:180b-11: thod pa kha tv'am ga bcas dang //
T02D1541:180b-12: lcags kyu mchog gis dgug pa dang //
T02D1541:180b-13: rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs nas //
T02D1541:180b-14: ye shes mchog dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1541:180b-15: rang snying pam yig las 'od zer //
T02D1541:180b-16: spro dang bsdu ba'i bzlas pa bya //
T02D1541:180b-17: aom shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a: bam h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1541:180b-18: sprul ba'i 'khor lor dbyangs kyi dang po thig les rnam par brgyan //
T02D1541:180b-19: snying dbus dro ba'i bzhi pa au yig bsil zer stong bas mdzes //
T02D1541:180b-20: longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbus su son pa'i rig byed dang po nyid //
T02D1541:180b-21: spyi bor ksha lhag n'a da dang bcas thig les rnam mdzes pa'i //
T02D1541:180b-22: srog dang rtsol ba legs bsdams pa'i //
T02D1541:180b-23: ye shes me ni rnam par 'bar //
T02D1541:180b-24: rlung bral mar me ltar gsal zhing //
T02D1541:180b-25: glog gi 'od mtshungs gyen song bas //
T02D1541:180b-26: thugs kyi rdo rje'i gnas son mchog gi sa bon legs bsregs nas //
T02D1541:180b-27: gsung gnas bzhugs dang sku yi rdo rje'i yi ge rnams bcom ste //
T02D1541:180b-28: bde chen gnas 'gro lus can rnams kyi skyed byed zhu ba las //
T02D1541:180b-29: 'dzag pa gang yin 'di ni kun dga' mchog gi gnas ster ba'o //
T02D1541:180b-30: mchog tu dga' ba'i mthar gnas pa //
T02D1541:180b-32: rgyun mi 'chad pas mngon goms pas //
T02D1541:180b-33: sems ni gnyis su med par 'gro //
T02D1541:180b-34: snying gi padmar zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar dbus gnas pa //
T02D1541:180b-35: phra ba'i thig le gsal ba'i gzugs kyis gnas pa rnam bltas te //
T02D1541:180b-36: der ni yang dang yang du srog 'gog sbyor ba las 'das pas //
T02D1541:180b-37: mkha' mnyam dri med mchog ni rnal 'byor pas mthong 'gyur //
T02D1541:180b-38: lus kyi dbus gnas skud pa la //
T02D1541:180b-40: rtse gcig sems kyis goms byas na //
T02D1541:180b-41: rtog med ye shes yang dag 'jug / dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1541:181a-0: a'a tsarya pradzny'a bha dras mdzad pa @181a * //
T02D1541:181a-3: // / bal po'i pandi ta su ma ti k'irti dang /
